Class StyleEditorUtility

java.lang.Object
  ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui.editor.StyleEditorUtility

public class StyleEditorUtility
extends java.lang.Object

Contains many constants, methods and other utility for the style editor.

Eric Marinier

StyleEditorUtility

Method Detail

decodeFeatureTextExtractor

public static FeatureTextExtractor decodeFeatureTextExtractor(java.lang.String text)
Extracts the feature text extractor from the passed string.

Parameters:
text - The text to extract the filter from.

createFont

public static java.awt.Font createFont(java.lang.String fontFamily,
                                       java.lang.String fontStyle,
                                       java.lang.String fontSize)
                                throws StyleEditorUtility.ConversionException
This method is a utility to turn the font parameters into a Font object.

Parameters:
fontFamily - The name of the font family as a string. Will be passed directly through to the Font class.
fontStyle - The style of the font, matching those in this class: BOLD_ITALIC, BOLD, ITALIC or PLAIN.
fontSize - An integer as a string that will be parsed.
Returns:
The created Font object based on the parameters.
Throws:
StyleEditorUtility.ConversionException

getFeatureEffectRenderer

public static ShapeEffectRenderer getFeatureEffectRenderer(java.lang.String effectText)
                                                    throws StyleEditorUtility.ConversionException
Converts the string to the associated ShapeEffectRender object.

Parameters:
effectText - Either: OUTLINE, SHADED, STANDARD or BASIC.
Returns:
The associated ShapeEffectRender object.
Throws:
StyleEditorUtility.ConversionException

getFeatureEffectRenderer

public static java.lang.String getFeatureEffectRenderer(ShapeEffectRenderer effect)
Converts the shape effect renderer to a string.

Parameters:
effect -
Returns:
The associated String.

getShapeRealizer

public static FeatureShapeRealizer getShapeRealizer(java.lang.String effectText)
                                             throws StyleEditorUtility.ConversionException
Converts the string to an associated feature shape realizer.

Parameters:
effectText - Either: CLOCKWISE_ARROW, CLOCKWISE_ARROW_2, COUNTERCLOCKWISE_ARROW, COUNTERCLOCKWISE_ARROW_2 or BLOCK.
Returns:
The associated FeatureShapeRealizer object.
Throws:
StyleEditorUtility.ConversionException

showColorPicker

public static java.awt.Color showColorPicker(java.awt.Component component,
                                             java.awt.Color color)
Shows the ColorPicker above the passed component's closest parent window with the starting color of the color picker being the passed color. This will show an option for editing the color's alpha value.

Parameters:
component - The component to show the color picker over.
color - The starting color of the color picker. *
Returns:
The user selected color. May be null.

showColorPicker

public static java.awt.Color showColorPicker(java.awt.Component component)
Shows the ColorPicker above the passed component's closest parent window. This will show an option for editing the color's alpha value.

Parameters:
component - The component to show the color picker over. *
Returns:
The user selected color. May be null.

Determines whether a JComboBox contains the passed object.

combo -
element -
Returns:
Whether or not the passed combo box contains the passed element.
